text: Use this github action and lock your theme folder in HubSpot <https://github.com/HubSpot/HubSpot-cms-deploy-action>
Just to wrap my head around that. I change the theme online, then I would fetch it locally and commit, by that the theme would be pushed to the other HubSpot installations, right?
Yeah thats my workflow, so only once I've nearly finished developing I would lock the theme on HubSpot and rely purely on Git push
